title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6018 - Basic Course For Correction Officers
content:

State Regulations
§ 6018.1 - Definitions
§ 6018.2 - Statement of purpose
§ 6018.3 - Minimum standards
§ 6018.4 - Requirements for approval of a basic course
§ 6018.5 - Requirements for conducting a basic course
§ 6018.6 - Requirements for issuance of a certificate of completion
§ 6018.7 - Time limitations for completion of the basic course for correction officers
§ 6018.8 - Issuance of equivalency certificates
§ 6018.9 - Annual reporting of peace officer training

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 6018

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 837-a[9], 840[2-a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
